answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Gregory, 
Unfortunately we do not many a lot of information on this topic on the Knowledge Network right now. The only resources I was able to find on this topic was a chapter on Fleet Management from a report by the ICMA Center for Performance Measurement. This document contains extensive information on the cost of maintenance (http://cpm.icma.org/Data/2003/Pdf/FY%2003%20Fleet%20Management%20Chapter.pdf). In addition to this report I found the "Transit Bus Life Cycle Cost and Year 2007 Emissions Estimation" by the U.S. Department of Transportation (http://www.proterra.com/images/WVU_FinalReport.pdf). I hope you find these resources useful and that any other members who have information on this topic chime in and submit their information to the Knowledge Network. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Gregory Stopka
text:
I have a member looking for data on the cost  of transit bus maintenance.  Are there any organizations that can share their maintenance data?  Any help is greatly appreciated.
Thanks,
Greg Stopka
Central Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
title: Transit Bus Maintenance Data
